Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.socket

Class SocketClientProxy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.socket.SocketClientProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualView, Remote
public class SocketClientProxy extends Object implements VirtualView
This class is a proxy for the client, it is used to send messages to the client through the socket.

    • setId

      protected void setId(int id)
      This method is used to set the ID of the client. It creates a new SocketMessage, adds the string "setId" and the provided ID to the message data, and then sends this message to the client through the output stream.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID to be set for the client.
